text: 46|28|Arra ni chikadzukou to, kare-ra ga kare o sashioite kami to shite hai shita mono-tachi wa, naze kare-ra o tasukenakatta no ka. Iya (tasukerudokoroka) guzo wa kare-ra kara sugata o keshite shimatta. Kore wa,(guzo o agameru kare-ra no ronri) kare-ra no gisakudeari, mata netsuzo shita monodeatta.
